name: NGI ProjectHome
blurb: Project:Home is a 3rd person action adventure with old school gaming elements. Help Alec save the world and find his missing father!

rewards.reward: How would you like access to a special backers only forum?  Give us feedback and get updates on Project:Home?  If so, this is for you!  Also, get your name in the credits of the game!
For $15 dollars you will receive a copy of the game when it is released! Plus, all the rewards above (when products become available).

Like high resolution wallpapers? Then this is for you!  $20 gets you the high resolution wallpaper set for Project:Home. This reward also includes all previous rewards (when products become available).

For $25, you fantastic donors will receive a copy of the originally composed sound track for Project:Home!  This is very exciting because the music is awesome! You'll love it!  Plus all previous rewards (when products become available).
You like our game?  Show off your support with this special edition Project:Home shirt that will only be available to Kickstarter donors. Plus all the rewards above (when products become available).

For $50, you will receive a nice poster to hang on your wall!  Plus, you get an awesome art book filled with the awesome art work of Project:Home!  And, everything else above (when products become available)!

Like upgrades and customization of your weapons?  This is the reward for you!  The weapon pak includes a silencer for Pearl (Alec's handgun) and other neat upgrades and skins for the weapon.  Plus, as always, everything above (when products become available)!
Okay, now it's time to get your hands dirty!  $100 gets you access to test our alpha and beta builds! Plus, you get everything above (when products become available)!

How would you like for your picture and name to be displayed somewhere in the Project:Home game?  Then we have you covered!  Plus, all previous rewards (excluding limited awards.  Also, when previous products become available)!

$500 is a lot of money! Whoa!  We'll make it worth your time.  Since Project:Home is a digital release, we'll hook you up with a physical copy!  This reward contains a limited edition boxed set for the game, and includes a physical copy of the art book and soundtrack. Plus all of the above (minus limited edition rewards.  Previous rewards ship as they become available).

Now we are really talking!  How would you like to know the back story to Project:Home?  This reward will get you a physical copy of the prequel to Project:Home!  Project:Home - The Beginning is an 8-bit prequel available for the NES.  That's right, we said it!  NES.  This reward comes with a physical red cartridge, instruction manual, and box.  You can only get it here as it will never be released outside of this campaign.  Plus, you get everything else above (minus limited edition rewards.  Previous rewards ship as they become available)!

The high rollers reward!  How would you like to be a character in the game?  Your general likeness will be transformed into an non-playable character in Project:Home.  Also, we'll give you a pair of Project:Home dog tags, and we'll setup a time for you to talk with the development team (via chat or phone call).  Plus, the previous rewards thing! (minus limited edition rewards. Previous rewards ship as they become available)

Do you have a vision for a non-playable character?  Would you like to see it in Project:Home?  This reward allows you to help us design an non-playable character for the game!  You'll work directly with the artists to make sure we get your idea correct!  Plus, the above rewards!  (minus limited edition rewards. Previous rewards ship as they become available)

How would you like to have a statue of yourself on display in the game?  For $2000, the people of Project:Home will see your larger-than-life statue in every level of the game!  Plus, previous rewards! (minus limited edition rewards. Previous rewards ship as they become available)

For this amount of money ... we'll ... you get a lot!  How does a sculpted bust model of Alec sound?  These are pretty cool!  They are each individually signed and numbered!  Plus all previous rewards! (minus limited edition rewards. Previous rewards ship as they become available)
